markdownRemark.excerpt: There are small things that developers can do that can improve the overall UX and development time and you don’t have to be a UX guru or read hundreds of books…
markdownRemark.html: There are small things that developers can do that can improve the overall UX and development time and you don’t have to be a UX guru or read hundreds of books on UX, there are small things that when passed unnoticed can damage application’s overall experience, on the other hand, if you spend some time to look for these small things and correct them, it will improve your app’s user experience.

frontmatter.title: Things developers can do to improve the UX
